title: 119: Bachelor Recap: Episode 6 (Pilot Pete & The Tammy Turbulence)
itunes:title: 119: Bachelor Recap: Episode 6 (Pilot Pete & The Tammy Turbulence)
description:
We are shook, Broads. Not only was the drama hot (per usual), Peter made some shocking decisions during this bonus Wednesday episode! The Broads chat about the new mighty and powerful Mykenna, Hannah Ann questions, the telenovela group date, a shocking VP send-off, ANOTHER VF one-on-one, the 2-on-1 packed with one liners, theories for the future episodes, and much more! 
FOLLOW @:
